  • The first notebook focuses on data profiling, trend analysis across categories, and interactive summaries of key metrics.
  • The second notebook delves into time series analysis, including decomposition, visualization, and trend analysis across various time dimensions.

appStages.name: Understanding Data
appStages.stageDetails:
{"components":[{"label":"HTML","attrs":[{"attr":"","value":""}],"content":"

Data Profiling Report

Overview

  •    This stage provides a thorough summary of the dataset, allowing for quick identification of data quality issues, data distribution, and other key characteristics..
","refreshOnChange":false,"key":"html","type":"htmlelement","input":false,"tableView":false},{"label":"Columns","columns":[{"components":[{"label":"HTML","attrs":[{"attr":"","value":""}],"content":"

A comprehensive summary of a dataset, including:

  • + Data size and structure.
  • + Unique values in each column.
  • + Sample data (top and bottom rows).
  • + Data types.
  • + Missing data.
  • + Key statistics (quantiles).
","refreshOnChange":false,"key":"html1","type":"htmlelement","input":false,"tableView":false}],"width":6,"offset":0,"push":0,"pull":0,"size":"md","currentWidth":6},{"components":[{"label":"HTML","attrs":[{"attr":"","value":""}],"content":"

Select Options:

  • + Choose 'Yes' to get a detailed Data Profiling Report.
  • + Choose 'Yes' to get a basic Target Summary with Categorical Columns.
  • + Select both as 'Yes' for a comprehensive analysis.

Function Output:

  • + 'Summary' Option: Provides data size, unique values, data types, sample data, missing values, and key statistics in the Data Profiling Report.
  • + 'Detailed' Option: Offers a basic overview of the Target Summary with Categorical Columns structure.

appStages.name: TimeSeries Insiaghts
appStages.stageDetails:
{"components":[{"label":"Columns","columns":[{"components":[{"label":"HTML","attrs":[{"attr":"","value":""}],"content":"

Data Exploration and Insights

Overview

  •    In this stage with the help of the time series decomposition, sales distribution, sales over time, and sales per store we get to understand more about the dataset which is crucial for making informed decisions.
","refreshOnChange":false,"key":"html","type":"htmlelement","input":false,"tableView":false},{"label":"wellopt","customClass":"danger","key":"wellopt","type":"well","input":false,"tableView":false,"components":[{"label":"HTML","attrs":[{"attr":"","value":""}],"content":"

Key Insights:

  •    Time Series Decomposition: Provides a breakdown of the data into trend, seasonality, and residual components, revealing patterns and potential anomalies.
  •    Sales Distribution: Visualizes the distribution of sales data to understand its shape, identify outliers, and evaluate potential data quality issues.
  •    Sales over Time: Provides a visual representation of sales trends over time to identify patterns, seasonality, and potential growth or decline.
  •    Sales per Store: Visualizes the sales distribution across different stores to compare their performance and identify potential differences.
